string.text: A special version of KAC PDW redesigned for use in The Zone. The Zone version of the Freak was built to mimic the look and feel of the CMMG MK-47 Mutant - An AR pattern rifle that is chambered in 7.62x39mm and feeds from AK magazines. The Freak is a light weight weapon with the dimensions of a standard submachine gun, an aiming range of 300 meters, and stopping power similar to a full lenght AK-47. Used by ISG special units, Freedom's most elite and the Syndicate.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBLE MOD KITS:\n %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Default: Specialized weapon mod kit
